item.title: Gradle and Groovy
item.description: Step 1. Intall Gradle on Mac brew install gradle Step 2. Write code task groovy { doLast { println "Hello Gradle" oneArg "10" } } def oneArg(x){ println "value 1 : $x" } Step 3. Run gradle groovy Done : )
